content: Disable your Quick Filter toolbar by a simple click on the "Quick Filter" button in the upper right corner.

content: Told by whom? Blacklisting is done by email providers, not Thunderbird. Contact your email provider's support to find out why you've been blacklisted.
creator: siffemoz
